TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventProvider extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 使用此類別 (Class) 來寫入事件。

span.span: Use this class to write events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要取用事件使用撰寫並事件的方法必須定義資訊清單; 中的事件寫入使用方法不需要資訊清單。To consume events written using the and methods, the events must be defined in a manifest; events written using the method do not require a manifest. 事件可以包含下列的 managed 的資料類型：Events can contain the following managed data types: - boolbool - BooleanBoolean - bytebyte - charchar - decimaldecimal - doubledouble - floatfloat - GuidGuid - intint - IntPtrIntPtr - longlong - sbytesbyte - shortshort - 字串string - uintuint - UInt64UInt64 如果您的資訊清單中的事件會使用`Boolean`的類型，您無法寫入資料的項目使用`Boolean`managed 程式碼中的資料類型。If an event in your manifest uses the `Boolean` in-type, you cannot write the data element using a `Boolean` data type in your managed code. `Boolean`中輸入您的資訊清單中所預期的 4 位元組值，和`Boolean`managed 程式碼中的資料類型是 1 個位元組。The `Boolean` in-type in your manifest expects a 4-byte value, and a `Boolean` data type in managed code is 1-byte. 相反地，您必須使用`int`寫入值的資料類型。Instead, you must use an `int` data type to write the value. 如果您想要記錄`Boolean`值，請使用 UInt8 中輸入您的資訊清單中。If you want to log a `Boolean` value, use the UInt8 in-type in your manifest.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊提供者。Registers the provider. 若要移除註冊完成時，呼叫方法。To remove the registration when finished, call the method.

exception.span: 沒有足夠記憶體可以完成這項作業。

span.span: There is not enough memory to complete the operation.

exception.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 中的類別只適用於 Windows Vista。

span.span: The classes in the namespace work only on Windows Vista.
The parameter cannot be null.

exception.span: ETW 子系統傳回的錯誤。

span.span: An error returned by the ETW subsystem.

summary.span: 從 ETW 子系統移除提供者的註冊，並釋放所有的 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Removes the provider's registration from the ETW subsystem and releases all unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該呼叫這個方法完成而不是等到系統處置資源。You should call this method when finished instead of waiting for the system to dispose of the resources.

exception.span: ETW 子系統傳回的錯誤。

span.span: An error returned by the ETW subsystem.

span.span: Gets the last error associated with an event write failure.

returns.span: 請使用這個值來判斷事件寫入失敗的原因。

span.span: Use the value to determine the cause of an event write failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法寫入事件失敗時，請設定此值。The , , and methods set this value if they fail to write the event. 這是靜態方法。This is a static method.

summary.span: 判斷工作階段是否已啟用提供者。

span.span: Determines whether a session enabled the provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEnabled ();
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsEnabled() cil managed
Public Function IsEnabled () As Boolean
public: bool IsEnabled();
member this.IsEnabled : unit -> bool

summary.span: 判斷是否有任何工作階段已啟用提供者 (不論用來啟用提供者的層級和關鍵字值為何)。

span.span: Determines whether any session enabled the provider, regardless of the level and keyword values used to enable the provider.

returns.span: 如果提供者已啟用至任何工作階段則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: Is if the provider is enabled to any session; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，提供者不會呼叫這個方法，以判斷是否已啟用提供者工作階段;提供者只會將事件與 ETW 可讓您決定是否要將事件記錄到的工作階段。Typically, a provider does not call this method to determine whether the provider has been enabled by a session; the provider simply writes the event, and ETW determines whether the event is logged to the session. 提供者可能想要呼叫此函式，如果提供者需要執行額外的工作來產生此事件。A provider may want to call this function if the provider needs to perform extra work to generate the event. 在此情況下，呼叫此函式第一次可節省資源和時間。In this case, calling this function first may save resources and time.

.method public hidebysig instance bool IsEnabled(unsigned int8 level, int64 keywords) cil managed
Public Function IsEnabled (level As Byte, keywords As Long) As Boolean

member this.IsEnabled : byte * int64 -> bool

param.name: level
param.span: 事件中包含的詳細資料層級。

span.span: Level of detail included in the event.

param.name: keywords
param.span: 指定事件類別的位元遮罩。

span.span: Bit mask that specifies the event category.

param.span: 此遮罩應該與事件之資訊清單中定義的關鍵字遮罩相同。

span.span: This mask should be the same keyword mask that is defined in the manifest for the event.

summary.span: 判斷是否有任何工作階段正在向提供者要求指定的事件。

span.span: Determines whether any session is requesting the specified event from the provider.

returns.span: 如果有任何工作階段正在要求指定的事件則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: Is if any session is requesting the specified event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，提供者不會呼叫這個方法，以判斷工作階段是否要求指定的事件;提供者只會將事件與 ETW 可讓您決定是否要將事件記錄到工作階段。Typically, a provider does not call this method to determine whether a session requested the specified event; the provider simply writes the event, and ETW determines whether the event is logged to a session. 提供者可能想要呼叫此函式，如果提供者需要執行額外的工作來產生此事件。A provider may want to call this function if the provider needs to perform extra work to generate the event. 在此情況下，呼叫此函式第一次可判斷是否在工作階段或不要求事件，可節省資源和時間。In this case, calling this function first to determine if a session requested the event or not, may save resources and time.

summary.span: 設定 方法使用的目前活動識別項。

span.span: Sets the current activity identifier used by the methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別碼會儲存在執行緒內容中。The identifier is stored in the thread context. 請注意，在版本 3.5 中的.NET framework，您必須設定`id`這個方法的參數和相同的識別碼值的屬性值。Note that in version 3.5 of the .NET framework, you had to set the `id` parameter of this method and the property value to the same identifier value. 不過，在 4.0 版的 framework，方法會自動為您設定相互關聯的活動識別項。However, in version 4.0 of the framework, the method automatically sets the correlation activity identifier for you. 這是靜態方法。This is a static method.

summary.span: 寫入事件。

span.span: Writes an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用資訊清單來定義您的事件，請使用這些方法。Use these methods if you use a manifest to define your events.

Console.WriteLine(EventProvider.GetLastWriteEventError()); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 該方法會使用的執行緒內容中設定的活動識別碼來識別此元件。The method uses the activity ID set in the thread context to identify this component. 若要設定的活動識別碼，呼叫方法。To set the activity ID, call the method. 如果您使用類別，您不使用方法，以指定的活動識別碼。If you use the class, you do not use the method to specify the activity ID. 相反地，存取屬性來取得物件。Instead, access the property to get the object. 然後，設定屬性設為活動識別碼。Then, set the property to the activity ID. 您也必須設定`relatedActivityId`至值。You must also set the `relatedActivityId` to a value.

exception.span: 如果 包含太多物件或字串。

span.span: If contains too many objects or strings.

param.name: eventDescriptor
param.span: 的執行個體 (Instance)，其識別要寫入的事件。

span.span: An instance of that identifies the event to write.

param.name: relatedActivityId
param.span: 上一個元件中的活動識別項。

span.span: Activity identifier from the previous component.

param.span: 請使用此參數將元件的事件連結到上一個元件的事件。

span.span: Use this parameter to link your component's events to the previous component's events.

param.name: dataCount
param.span: 參數所指向之事件資料的大小。

span.span: Size of the event data to which the parameter points.

param.span: 事件資料大小上限為 64 KB 減去事件標頭大小。

span.span: The maximum event data size is limited to 64 KB minus the size of the event headers.

param.span: 如果工作階段的緩衝區大小較小且包含延伸的資料項目與事件，則事件大小較小。

span.span: The event size is less if the session's buffer size is less and the session includes extended data items with the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要寫入之事件資料的指標。

span.span: Pointer to the event data to write.

summary.span: 在端對端案例中追蹤事件時，將事件連結在一起。

span.span: Links events together when tracing events in an end-to-end scenario.

summary.span: 事件資料會指定為記憶體區塊。

span.span: The event data is specified as a block of memory.

returns.span: 如果已寫入事件則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: Is if the event is written; otherwise, .

returns.span: 若為 false，請呼叫 方法，判斷失敗的原因。

span.span: If false, call the method to determine the cause of the failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 該方法會使用的執行緒內容中設定的活動識別碼來識別此元件。The method uses the activity ID set in the thread context to identify this component. 若要設定的活動識別碼，呼叫方法。To set the activity ID, call the method.
